body_html: About dealing with single elements - I think it'd be the best to have a custom (possibly lazy) scalar type (like numpy does). It could use a 1-sized tensor to store it. This would allow us to e.g. avoid host sync when computing CUDA reductions, and would make Variables behave more like Tensors (e.g. you could no longer index them forever).
